mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Schenck, Robert C. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Schenck, Robert C.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling May 18 1862. By Telegraph from Franklin 18 1862. Capt Shaw of third 3 va Cavalry having resigned and his resignation accepted it is very important to have his place filled at once the Sergeant who has been recommended is I believe a good and suitable man give us him or Somebody. Robt. C. Schenck Brig Genl 42Gs178pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Schenck, Robert C.
Franklin, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
